name: GitLab Dark and Flat
description: A simple dark theme for GitLab.
additional_info:
If an unstyled element is found, please leave the information
in the discussion so it can be fixed quickly.

2018-10-28 update - Styled some white sections of CI pages, Added color to some buttons

2018-10-21.2 update - Quick fix for unstyled web IDE divs after last update

2018-10-21 update - Incorporated styles from Jake C and vschn

2018-08-20 update - fixed ssh keys page, billing, and active sessions pages

2018-07-22 update - fixed unstyled links in project->details and white issue board background

2018-07-17 update - fixed white topbar of code viewer 

2018-06-29 update - styled docs.gitlab.com and project settings page

2018-06-25 update - styled login page

2018-06-24.2 update - styled focused comments and removed white border from images

2018-06-24 update - changed other half of colorscheme of ace editor

2018-06-23 update - changed some links to blue from white,
fixed commit input in web ide changing to white.

2018-06-20 update - styled list element numbers & code tags

2018-06-14 update - small fixes

2018-06-08.3 update - styled group list selection and some hard to read parts of CI page

2018-06-08.2 update - styled diff notes and CI pipelines courtesy of Ashley Dumaine

2018-06-08 update - fixed white sections of issues, buttons, and some hard to read code highlighting

2018-06-07 update - styled web ide

2018-06-06 update - styled issue board and issue labels

discussions.name: Bug report: Highlighted comments on issue tracker are white-on-white
Local Edits I had to do
Bug report: minor glitches on commit pages with diffs
